{{ruby|'''不氪不爱'''|The Game}}是动画《[[银之守墓人]]》的片尾曲。

== 简介 ==
英文名The Game，中文名不氪不爱。实际上是一首歌，全曲英文歌词，并无官方中文版。

== MV ==
动画版：{{bilibilivideo|id=9734350}}

完整版：{{bilibilivideo|id=11551424}}

== 歌词 ==
{{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:#0000FF;|rstyle=color:#ff1111;|reserveWidth=70px
|original=
　
The story starts from a Cupid game
I met a girl that day
She's the one controls the fate
I fell in love that day
I have to win her have to win the game

If you wanna win you gotta pay
Let money paves the way
I win the game and win her heart right away
She is fin'lly on her way to a lovely date
And I hope to say goodbye to lonely days
My days
Life is like the game
Everybody pays
Go for what we need. See what we did
Got what we make
Life is like the game
How much did you pay for your dream
For your soul and your love
For it happily ends

|translated=
　
像一场浪漫游戏
从遇见她那天起
被她左右的命运
从爱上她那天起
我需要胜利 赢得她芳心

胜利总有代价
就让金钱说话
赢得芳心之旅 是否即将开启
是否即将开启
等她来临 我便不再孤寂
我的美好时光
人生这场游戏
人人都在{{rubyh|尽力|[[课金|氪金]]}}
去争取 去面对
去接受结局
人生这场游戏
你曾为梦想{{rubyh|付出多少勇气|氪了多少金}}
为信念 为了爱
为美好的结局

}}
